text:
vAja#syEqmaM pra#saqvaH su#ShuvEq agrEq sOmaq(gm)q rAjA#naqmOSha#dhIShvaqPsu |
tA aqsmaByaqM madhu#matIrBavantu vaqya(gm) rAqShTrE jA$griyAma puqrOhi#tAH || 
vAja#syEqdaM pra#saqva A ba#BUvEqmA caq viSvAq Buva#nAni saqrvata#H | 
sa viqrAjaqM paryE#ti prajAqnan praqjAM puShTi#M ~Mvaqd^^rdhaya#mAnO aqsmE ||
vAja#syEqmAM pra#saqvaH Si#SriyEq diva#miqmA caq viSvAq Buva#nAni saqmrAT | 
adi#thsantaM dApayatu prajAqnan raqyiM - [  ] 40
